summary: Follows the vagrant sisters work for crooked characters at a rock 'n' roll prison's farm.
cast: Mamie Van Doren|Lori Nelson|John Russell|Don Burnett|Eddie Cochran|Lurene Tuttle|Yvonne Lime|Jeanne Carmen|Robert Foulk|Wayne Taylor|Jered Barclay|Keith Richards|Valerie Reynolds|Lucita|Glenn Dixon|Wally Brown|Stanley Andrews|Robert Banas|Les Baxter|Gilbert Brady|Nikki Faustino Brady|Jim Canino|Michael Emmet|Terry Frost|William Henry|Kenner G. Kemp|Joe Lanza|Alex Montoya|Lennie Smith|Lou Southern|Leon Tyler|John Veitch
title: Untamed Youth
